name: generator-devjs
description: DevJS's Yeoman generator, for our own projects, but also for you.

scripts.build: rm -rf generators; babel src -d generators --presets es2015 --plugins add-module-exports --ignore 'src/_template/**'; cp -r src/_template generators/_template

author: Jamen Marzonie <jamenmarz@gmail.com> (http://jamenmarz.com/)
